sentences.en: ...a second disk that offers, among other enticements, an interactive tour of Hogwarts.
sentences.cn: ...第二张盘提供了种种诱惑，其中包括一个霍格华兹的互动游览程序。

sentences.en: He fell victim to her enticement.
There are so many enticement offers that I can not refuse the job.
sentences.cn: 这项工作有那么多优惠待遇,使我难以拒绝.

sentences.en: There is so many enticement offer that I can not refuse the job.
sentences.cn: 这项工作有那麽多优惠待遇,使我难以拒绝.

words.tran_cn: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tran_en: An enticement is something that makes people want to do a particular thing
